```{r setup}
library(citation)
```

The `citation` package provides an R interface to retrieve APA citation about a research article (link the article) from Google scholar website - and most importantly, output a character string of the APA citation!

## Creating APA citations

Given a article title and the API code the `APA_citation()` function  retrieves a JSON object with metadata about that comic.

```{r}
API_key <- readLines("api.txt")

API_key
```

```{r example}
library(citation)

APA <- APA_citation("Abuse is abuse: The influence of type of abuse, victim age, and defendant age on juror decision making", API_key)

APA
```
